articles.content:
Friendship  meeting with Chinese delegation
   Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- Officials of the Korean Democratic Women's Union held a friendship meeting with the members of the delegation of the All-China Women's Federation in Pyongyang on May 17.   Present at the meeting were Hong Son Ok, vice-chairperson of the central committee of the Korean Democratic Women's Union, and other union officials in Pyongyang.   
   Members of the delegation of the All-China Women's Federation led by Liu Easy, vice-president of the federation and vice-Minister of Labor and Social Security, were present.
   Participants deepened friendly feelings, talking with each other about the achievements and experience made by the two women's unions and singing songs.

articles.content:
Kim Jong Il praised abroad
    Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- A lecture meeting and a film show were held in Austria on May 6 to commemorate the 35th anniversary of the start of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work at the Central Committee of the Worker's Party of Korea (June 19, 1964).
    The immortal revolutionary exploits of Kim Jong Il were lauded at the functions.   A Korean film was screened there.
